name: I'm Hooked
description:
"I'm hooked" was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam in 48 hours, the theme was "Only one".

I made a co-operative puzzle game, in the vein of Portal 2's co-op, however I then forced the player to play alone (There is only one player in this co-operative game). The idea was, to create a game with puzzles in that were easily solvable with 2 players, but now that there was only one, required more thought.

Again, all puzzles are solvable with both one person, and two people, but there is no way to get a second player into the game.

Enjoy.
